duration.Description: Duration of the event (measured from onset) in seconds

sample.Description: Onset of the event according to the sampling scheme of the recorded modality (i.e., referring to the raw data file that the events.tsv file accompanies).

response_time.Description: Latency of button press after auditory stimulus

stim_file.Description: Represents the location of the stimulus file (image, video, sound etc.) presented at the given onset time. They should be stored in the /stimuli folder (under the root folder of the dataset; with optional subfolders). The values under the stim_file column correspond to a path relative to "/stimuli".

Levels.noise_with_reponse: White noise for 60 ms, followed by response (incorrect distractor)
Levels.oddball_with_reponse: Oddball at 1000 hz for 60 ms, followed by response (correct target)
Levels.standard_with_reponse: Standard at 500 hz for 60 ms, followed by response (incorrect)
